name: Burden (itch) (Amethyst Lynx)
description:
Burden is a 3D first-person game that allows you to walk in the shoes of someone who is suffering from depression and anxiety.

You have 4 days to walk out of the house, which is harder than it sounds. During these 4 days, you will have to gather the mental strength needed in order to overcome your anxiety and finally go outside of your comfort zone. Art and self-care will help, but depression will make it difficult to complete those actions.

WASD, Mouse   -   move
Space, Q, E, R, T, K   -   interact (also suggested in-game when needed)

3D Models, Materials, Textures   -   Unity Asset Store, TurboSquid, Sketchfab
Sounds   -   Freesound
Drawings & Artistic texts   -   unnamed author
Testing & Feedback   -   Ina, TFphoenix
Programming, Design, Icons   -   Amethyst Lynx
